All of our Temp-A-Sure team members are trained heating and air conditioning specialists… and this include our top management. We know that it can be a challenge to decide which people to bring into your home to work on your furnace, air conditioner, hot water tank and/or gas line. That’s why we’ve built a reputation in the Toronto region for excellence.

For more than a decade, Eco Star Home Services Co. has dedicated itself in providing affordable and reliable home comfort solutions that every family deserves. Now, Then and Always, we will be here for you. Eco Star is not a flash-in-the-pan company. Our proudest accomplishment is the large number of long-term customers who year after year put their trust in us.

And we don’t settle with “good enough”. Our sales and technicians are provided with continuing education opportunities on a regular basis to allow them to stay current with the latest products and technology. 

Our Support

To underscore that statement, on top of our standard, office-based support, available from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Sunday, we take support one step further by offering 24/7 customer service! 

Our One-Stop Service
We handle all aspects of your HVAC related needs. We are here to offer you a one-stop service from finding the right product for your HVAC needs, explaining the rebate process, and arranging a Registered Energy Advisor. Receipt of Eligible Rebates Guaranteed!  We take care of the complicated stuff so you can take care of your family and work.
